name: Kick Off (itch) (Diego Cervantes Zeledón)
description:
Kick Off is a football themed video game, it is a puzzle and turn-based strategy game. The game represents a kick return in a match, in which a lone runner will face the opposing team. The goal is to get to the end zone with your character without being tackled by enemies.

Your task will be to recognize your position on the field and each turn to make the best move decision to get to the end zone without being stopped. But be careful, if you end a turn in the same square as an opponent, you will be tackled and return to the beginning.

This prototype has two different levels to play. Developed using Unity.
